Uses of Class
photoshop.empty.Picture

    • Uses of Picture in photoshop.empty

      Methods in photoshop.empty that return Picture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Picture Picture.blur(int dist)
      perform a blur using the colors of pixels within dist of current pixel
      Picture Picture.decode()
      steganography decode (return a new Picture containing the message hidden in this picture)
      Picture Picture.glassFilter(int dist)
      Simulate looking at an image through a pane of glass
      Picture Picture.simpleBlur()
      perform a simple blur using the colors of neighboring pixels
      Methods in photoshop.empty with parameters of type Picture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Picture.chromakey(Picture other, java.awt.Color color, int dist)
      copy another picture's pixels into this picture, if a color is within dist of param Color
      void Picture.encode(Picture msg)
      steganography encode (hide the message in msg in this picture)
      Constructors in photoshop.empty with parameters of type Picture 
      Constructor and Description
      Picture(Picture picture)
      Creates a Picture based off of an existing Picture
      PictureViewer(Picture picture)
      Creates a PictureViewer with a given Picture
